112:
When the user’s move is successful, charges
the user’s move gauge by two.
113:
Sync pairs that use a move successfully
recover about 6% of their total HP.
114:
Either the Attack, Defense, Sp. Atk, Sp. Def,
Speed, accuracy, or evasiveness of sync pairs
that use a move successfully is raised by
one rank.
115:
When the user’s move is successful, either the
opponent’s Attack, Defense, Sp. Atk, Sp. Def,
Speed, accuracy, or evasiveness is lowered by
one rank.
116:

117:

that use a move successfully is raised by
one rank.

by 50%.

by 50%.

activates the following field effect. Each time
this field effect is activated, it will be permanent.

• [Name:FieldEffectType ]
150:
The first time the user enters each battle,
reduces the user’s sync move countdown
by three.
151:
Lowers the total number of moves the user
needs to use before they can unleash a sync
move by the number of allied sync pairs
participating in battle.
152:
Restore one MP for all the moves of sync pairs
that use a move successfully.
153:
Reduces damage by 50% when the user is hit
by an attack.
154:
Applies the Damage Guard Next effect to sync
pairs that use a move successfully.
155:
Applies the Free Move Next effect to sync
pairs that use a move successfully.
156: The move gauge charges very quickly.
157:

Speed, accuracy, and evasiveness of all
opposing sync pairs by six stat ranks.
158:
Raises the user's Attack, Defense, Sp. Atk,
Sp. Def, Speed, accuracy, and evasiveness
by six stat ranks the first time the user enters
each battle.
159:
When an allied sync pair uses a move
successfully, reduces the sync move
countdown by one.
160:

sync pairs that use a move successfully.
161:

nine.
